jathika aarthikaya saha podu yahapatha apage prakashaye apa sadahan kala karunak wuye, gunadasa amarasekarayange adahaswala dakwunu paridi jathika chinthanaya nuthanathwaya pilibanda gataluwata wisandumak washayen sinhala-bauddha jathiya godananwime, jathika aarthikayak godananwime wyapruthiyak sampadanaya karannata deshapalana salasum kirimen, aarthikaya deshapalanaye mul thanata gena eemata yojana kirimen, samaja sansiddhin samajiya injineru kramayen wisandiya haki ”samajiya gatalu” lesa sankalpanaya kirima nuthanathwaye ugulatama sirawimak bawayi.
